column4: Australia's Kidman Resources to supply lithium for Tesla cars
column5: Australia's Kidman Resources said on Thursday it will supply lithium for Tesla Inc's electric car batteries  the latest in a string of deals by carmakers securing supplies of the mineral as demand surges for clean cars.
